dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3678 IH: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to designate the District of Columbia as an empowerment zone.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to designate the District of Columbia as an empowerment zone.

section.header: District of Columbia treated as empowerment zone

subsection.text: Section 1391(b)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by adding at the end the following: There shall be treated as an empowerment zone designated under this section so much of the District of Columbia as would result in the largest area within DC meeting the eligibility requirements for designation under 1391. Deemed treatment under the preceding sentence shall not be taken into account in determining the number of empowerment zones which may be designated under this section..
The amendments made by this section shall apply to periods beginning after December 31, 2016.
